channel.author: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
channel.description: This is a Podcast where we elevate young African voices in their richness and bareness. We are located in New York from Zimbabwe and Kenya. We will be having honest, intelligent, insightful conversations with the aim of bringing to you what it means to be existing as a young African away from home.

item.dc:creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
item.description:
In this episode, I (Wambui) do a solo episode taking you through the where we disappeared to, why we are back, what the plan is: and other fun podcasting things. Then I tell you a story about my first time coming to New York and most recently, my experience getting the Covid Vaccine. Spoiler: I had a really tough experience with it. haha. 


Hope you enjoy! And check us out on Instagram @theafroexistingpodcast

item.title: Where have I been? Stories from the summer and oh, we're back!

item.dc:creator: Lynnet Wambui Muritu
item.description: Hello! Welcome to the first episode of the Afro Existing Podcast! We are so glad you are here and hope you stay.  Subscribe to get notified when we upload next week. *Excited because it is actually happening.  Please leave us a review and message us @theafroexistingpodcast to let us know what you think.

item.title: And We are Live! Here's to new Beginnings | Get to know us, Friends, Campus and Just Existing
